data.comment: Erick (Paranaense) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maracana have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 1, Jaime Alvarado hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Paranaense!
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 5, Paranaense have a goal kick.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Flamengo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 7, Pedro of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Flamengo's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Paranaense throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 11, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Paranaense pushes forward through Renato Kayzer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Pedro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 20, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 26, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Gabriel Noga (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paranaense's Renato Kayzer gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Richard (Paranaense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Flamengo.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 37, Ze Ivaldo (Paranaense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 41, Flamengo are pushing forward but Vitinho's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 44, Paranaense advance rapidly upfield but Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows for offside.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In Rio de Janeiro, Gerson of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio do Maracana.
Filipe Luis (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 46, Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a first substitution, with Everton Ribeiro replacing Vitinho.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Everton Ribeiro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Pedro’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 49, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 50, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Pedro for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 53, Flamengo needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 54, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick Paranaense.
Pedro puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 59, An attacking Flamengo player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Bruno Henrique nets and Flamengo extend their lead to 2-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
The away team have replaced Jaime Alvarado with Erick. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Maciel de Barros.
In the minute 60, Ravanelli is replacing Lucho Gonzalez for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 62, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 63, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Paranaense throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Paranaense are whistled for offside.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Flamengo.
At Estadio do Maracana, Richard has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 67, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) gets a yellow card.
Renato Kayzer (Paranaense) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 67, Leo Gomes with an assist there.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 71, Gerson (Flamengo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 74, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Paranaense's area.
Christian is replacing Richard for the away team.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 77, It's now 3-1 in Rio de Janeiro as Everton Ribeiro scores for Flamengo.
That's a fine assist from Giorgian De Arrascaeta.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 80, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Walter replacing Jorginho.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Paranaense make their fifth substitution with Wellington replacing Leo Gomes.
Lincoln is on a sub for Pedro for Flamengo.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Bruno Henrique with Michael.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 86, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Diego is replacing Giorgian De Arrascaeta for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a fifth substitution, with Ramon replacing Filipe Luis.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Wellington for Paranaense has been booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
Paranaense's Christian has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
